    (function () {

        // our Logger object
        var Logger = {
            _instance: undefined, // we shouldn't directly touch it, it's used inside of require block
            _queue: [], // the queue should be used when _instance is not defined
            log: function (label, logObj, additionalParams) {
                additionalParams = additionalParams || {};
                if (this._instance) {
                    if (!additionalParams.preLoad) {
                        additionalParams.preLoad = 'no';
                    }
                    this._instance.logError(label, logObj, additionalParams);
                } else {
                    // we don't have a logger yet, so just queue it
                    additionalParams.preLoad = 'yes';
                    this._queue.push({
                        label: label,
                        logObj: logObj,
                        additionalParams: additionalParams
                    });
                }
            }
        };

        // it's safe to attach all handlers here
        window.addEventListener('error', function (errorEvent) {
            Logger.log('1dClientSideError', errorEvent.error, {errorMessage: errorEvent.message});
        });

        window.addEventListener('load', function () {
            if ((!document.getElementById('new-homepage-search-wizard') || !document.getElementById('new-homepage-search-wizard').hasChildNodes()) &&
                    (!document.getElementById('wizard-tabs') || !document.getElementById('wizard-tabs').hasChildNodes())) {
                Logger.log('1dWizardFailedToLoad', {
                    pageUrl: encodeURIComponent(window.location.href)
                });
            }
        });

        require('dctk/clientLogging', function (clientLogging) {
            // the logger is ready, we can just get a reference to it
            Logger._instance = clientLogging;
            // then process the queue
            while (Logger._queue.length) {
                var queueEntry = Logger._queue.shift();
                Logger.log(queueEntry.label, queueEntry.logObj, queueEntry.additionalParams);
            }
        });

    })();
</script>

            require(['jquery', 'dctk/dctk'], function($, dctk) {
                $('#hotel-listing-module').on('click', '.flex-link', function(event) {
                    event.preventDefault();
                    var url = $(this).attr('href');

                    dctk.logExperiment({id: 9924, callback: function() {
                        // Workaround for logExperiment() not waiting for Omniture to be initialized
                        // or for the event to be sent successfully.
                        dctk.onReady(function() {
                            setTimeout(function() {
                                window.location.href = url;
                            }, 500);
                        });
                    }});
                });
            });
        </script>

id="pocket-guide" class="toggle  module" data-type="read-more" data-open-tracking-id="TG.LP.HotelGuide.ReadMore" data-close-tracking-id="TG.LP.HotelGuide.Hide"><section id="pocket-guide-content" class="toggle-pane"><header id="pocket-guide-section-header"   class="cols-row-header cf section-header no-group"><h2 class="section-header-main">Tokyo Hotel Guide</h2></header><span id="content-teaser"><div><p><h4>Top Tokyo Accommodations</h4> Looking for a place to sleep in Tokyo and could do with a little advice? Expedia makes it a breeze to organize your getaway. This destination offers a multitude of places to stay within 1 mile of the center, with 89 available.</p><p>The <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Tokyo-Hotels-Four-Seasons-Hotel-Tokyo-At-Marunouchi.h894625.Hotel-Information">Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi</a> and the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Tokyo-Hotels-Mandarin-Oriental-Tokyo.h1340774.Hotel-Information">Mandarin Oriental Tokyo</a> are perfect if you're eager to stay in the main area. Travelers also like to stay at the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Tokyo-Hotels-Shangri-La-Hotel-Tokyo.h2434355.Hotel-Information">Shangri-La Hotel, Tokyo</a> and <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Tokyo-Hotels-The-Peninsula-Tokyo.h1631412.Hotel-Information">The Peninsula Tokyo</a> during their time here.</p><p>Boasting 68 hotels and 1 mile from the heart of the city, Chuo is a well-known neighborhood to set up base. If you're eager to know some of the better hotels here, the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Tokyo-Hotels-Courtyard-By-Marriott-Tokyo-Ginza.h24903.Hotel-Information">Courtyard by Marriott Tokyo Ginza</a> and <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Tokyo-Hotels-Royal-Park-Hotel.h21288.Hotel-Information">Royal Park Hotel</a> are great places to start. Just 2 miles from the center you'll come across Minato, another neighborhood to take notice of. Youâ€™re not limited for choice here either, with 78 hotels to choose from. <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Tokyo-Hotels-The-Ritz-Carlton-Tokyo.h1583214.Hotel-Information">The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo</a> and <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Tokyo-Hotels-Grand-Hyatt-Tokyo.h2167.Hotel-Information">Grand Hyatt Tokyo</a> are some that won't disappoint you.</p><p><h4>Hotels Near Tokyo's Attractions</h4> Tokyo is famous for Tokyo Tower. The Conrad Tokyo and Palace Hotel Tokyo, are handy options for travelers as they are within walking distance of Tokyo Tower.</p><p>The Imperial Hotel and also the Tokyo Station Hotel are within a short walk from Tsukiji Fish Market, while the Capitol Hotel Tokyu and the InterContinental ANA Tokyo are situated close to Yasukuni Shrine.â€¨ the Tokyo National Museum and Yoyogi Park are other much-visited Tokyo destinations. The Sadachiyo and the Annex Katsutaro Ryokan are conveniently close to the Tokyo National Museum, and the Park Hyatt Tokyo and the Hilton Tokyo, are near Yoyogi Park.</p><p>Mitsukoshi is one of the leading shopping destinations in the area and a wonderful place to indulge in a bit of retail therapy. If this sparks your interest, you should make a choice between the Daiichi Hotel Tokyo and Hotel Okura Tokyo. As a visitor to East Garden, you'll get the chance to breathe in the marvelous perfume of fresh flowers and enjoy the peace and tranquility. If you feel more inclined to tour this attraction, the Daiichi Hotel Tokyo and Hotel Okura Tokyo are you best accommodation options.</p><p><h4>How to Get to Tokyo</h4> If you are planning on arriving via Haneda Airport, you can book a room at the Haneda Excel Hotel Tokyu, or the Hotel Jal City Haneda Tokyo, both of which are a short distance away.</p></div></span><span class="rm-hide"         function loadDataFromCookies() {
            var cookieArray = document.cookie.split(';'),
                processMediaCookie = function(cookieValue) {
                    var parts = cookieValue.split('|'),
                        itemValues;
                    for (var i = 0; i < parts.length; i++) {
                        if (parts[i] !== undefined && parts[i].length >= 4) {
                            itemValues = parts[i].split(',');
                            if (itemValues.length >= 4) {
                                if (itemValues[2] === 'BKC') {
                                    blueKai.push(itemValues[3]);
                                } else if (itemValues[2] === 'TDEST') {
                                    tdest.push(itemValues[3]);
                                } else if (itemValues[2] === 'PDEST') {
                                    pdest.push(itemValues[3]);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                },
                processMC1Cookie = function(cookieValue) {
                    var parts = cookieValue.split('=');
                    if (parts.length >= 2) {
                        userId = parts[1];
                    }
                };

            for (var i = 0; i < cookieArray.length; i++) {
                var cookie = trim(cookieArray[i]),
                    separatorIndex = cookie.indexOf('='),
                    name = (separatorIndex > -1) ? trim(cookie.substr(0, separatorIndex)) : undefined,
                    value = (separatorIndex > -1) ? decodeURIComponent(trim(cookie.substr(separatorIndex+1))) : undefined;

                if (name !== undefined && value !== undefined) {
                    switch(name) {
                        case 'MediaCookie':
                            processMediaCookie(value);
                            break;
                        case 'MC1':
                            processMC1Cookie(value);
                            break;
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        function initializeAds() {
            if (autoInitialize === true) {
                require('adtoolkit', function(adtk) {
                    adtk.initialize();
                });
            }
            scriptsLoaded = true;
            onItemLoaded();

            if(deferServiceCalls === false) {
                makeServiceCall();
            }
        }

        function makeServiceCall() {
            loadSlotInfo();

            // Load user targeting; if we don't auto generate user info then wait for it to be passed in
            if (autoGenerateUserInfo === true) {
                loadTargeting();
            } else {
                require('adtoolkit-user-info', function (userinfo) {
                    if (userinfo) {
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('memberId')) {
                            memberId = userinfo.memberId;
                        }
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('userId')) {
                            userId = userinfo.userId;
                        }
                        if (userinfo.hasOwnProperty('isBot')) {
                            // translate from string if string
                            isBot = (true == userinfo.isBot);
                        }
                    }
                    loadTargeting();
                });
            }
        }

        define('adtoolkit', ['expads'], function(expads) {
            return {
                initialize: function () {
                    if(deferServiceCalls === true){
                        makeServiceCall();
                    }
                    deferred.done(function () {
                        expads.initialize();
                    })
                        .fail(function (message) {
                            console.log(message);
                        });
                },
                refresh: function(targeting) {
                    if (targeting === undefined) {
                        expads.refresh();
                    } else {
                        var adinfoParams = defaultAdinfoParams(),
                            adinfo = cleanTargetingArgs(targeting);
                        addIfNonEmpty(adinfoParams, 'dest', adinfo.dest_region);
                        loadAdinfo(adinfoParams, targeting, function(updatedTargeting) {
                            expads.refresh(updatedTargeting)
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        });

        $(document).ready(initializeAds); // TODO: should we initialize on window load or document ready?
    });
})(window, document);

</script>

        <script async defer>
    //UITK Typeahead Accessibility Fix
    require(['jquery', 'uitk', 'uitk_typeahead'], function($, uitk, uitkTypeahead){
        uitkTypeahead.prototype.next = function() {
            var links = this.$ta.find("a"),
                current = this.$ta.find(".highlight").removeClass("highlight"),
                i = links.index(current),
                next = links[i + 1],
                nextId = $(next).attr("id"),
                item, a11yText = "";
            $(current).attr("aria-selected", "false");
            if ($(links[i + 1]).hasClass("close")) {
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(i.t("close"), "assertive")
            }
            if (!$("html").hasClass("safari")) {
                if (this.firstItemFlag === true) {
                    this.firstItemFlag = false
                } else {
                    if (typeof links[i] === "undefined") {
                        item = $(".active-tooltip").find("a")[0];
                        a11yText = $(item).attr("data-value");
                        uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(a11yText, "polite")
                    }
                }
            }
            if (next) {
                $(next).addClass("highlight");
                $(next).attr("aria-selected", "true");
                this.$element.attr("aria-activedescendant", nextId);
                if($(next).attr("data-value")){
                    uitk.utils.liveAnnounce($(next).attr("data-value"), "polite")
                }
            } else {
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(this.$element.val(), "polite")
            }
        };


        uitkTypeahead.prototype.prev = function() {
            var links = this.$ta.find("a"),
                current = this.$ta.find(".highlight").removeClass("highlight"),
                i = links.index(current),
                prev = links[i - 1],
                prevId = $(prev).attr("id");
            $(current).attr("aria-selected", "false");
            if (prev) {
                $(prev).addClass("highlight");
                $(prev).attr("aria-selected", "true");
                this.$element.attr("aria-activedescendant", prevId)
                if($(prev).attr('data-value')) {
                    uitk.utils.liveAnnounce($(prev).attr('data-value'), 'polite');
                }
            } else {
                this.$element.removeAttr("aria-activedescendant");
                $('[aria-selected="true"]').attr("aria-selected", "false");
                uitk.utils.liveAnnounce(this.$element.val(), "polite")
            }
        };
    });

</script>

Expedia makes it a breeze to organize your getaway. This destination offers a multitude of places to stay within 1 mile of the center, with 89 available. The Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi and the Mandarin Oriental Tokyo are perfect if you're eager to stay in the main area. Travelers also like to stay at the Shangri-La Hotel, Tokyo and The Peninsula Tokyo during their time here. Boasting 68 hotels and 1 mile from the heart of the city, Chuo is a well-known neighborhood to set up base. If you're eager to know some of the better hotels here, the Courtyard by Marriott Tokyo Ginza and Royal Park Hotel are great places to start. Just 2 miles from the center you'll come across Minato, another neighborhood to take notice of. Youâ€™re not limited for choice here either, with 78 hotels to choose from. The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo and Grand Hyatt Tokyo are some that won't disappoint you. Hotels Near Tokyo's Attractions Tokyo is famous for Tokyo Tower. The Conrad Tokyo and Palace Hotel Tokyo, are handy options for travelers as they are within walking distance of Tokyo Tower. The Imperial Hotel and also the Tokyo Station Hotel are within a short walk from Tsukiji Fish Market, while the Capitol Hotel Tokyu and the InterContinental ANA Tokyo are situated close to Yasukuni Shrine.â€¨ the Tokyo National Museum and Yoyogi Park are other much-visited Tokyo destinations. The Sadachiyo and the Annex Katsutaro Ryokan are conveniently close to the Tokyo National Museum, and the Park Hyatt Tokyo and the Hilton Tokyo, are near Yoyogi Park. Mitsukoshi is one of the leading shopping destinations in the area and a wonderful place to indulge in a bit of retail therapy. If this sparks your interest, you should make a choice between the Daiichi Hotel Tokyo and Hotel Okura Tokyo. As a visitor to East Garden, you'll get the chance to breathe in the marvelous perfume of fresh flowers and enjoy the peace and tranquility. If you feel more inclined to tour this attraction, the Daiichi Hotel Tokyo and Hotel Okura Tokyo are you best accommodation options. How to Get to Tokyo If you are planning on arriving via Haneda Airport, you can book a room at the Haneda Excel Hotel Tokyu, or the Hotel Jal City Haneda Tokyo, both of which are a short distance away.
